CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(PaysRegionPF__c, 'USA'), RYF_Devis__c, IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(Prix_0_Km_Devis__c )), NOT(ISNULL(Prix_des_kms_inclus_les_100_kms_Devis__c )), NOT(ISNULL(Kilometrage__c )), NOT(ISNULL(LoyerMensuel__c )) ), (LoyerMensuel__c / ( Prix_0_Km_Devis__c +( Kilometrage__c * ( Prix_des_kms_inclus_les_100_kms_Devis__c /100 ) ) ) -1) , IF(NOT(ISNULL( RYF_pourcentage__c )),RYF_pourcentage__c , RVB__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: RYF
